ComicInfo.Summary:
As Shattersword catches up with the group, Kasa finds herself in the clutches of the Spider Queen, in a prison ten miles in the sky.
It's Mad Max meets Akira in a genre mashing, expectation smashing new hit series from Justin Jordan, creator of Luther Strode, Spread, and Reaver, joined in mayhem by newcomer artist Tysaseta, colorist Sarah Stern and letter Rachel Deering. Breaklands Season Two is the follow up to last yearâ€™s smash hit debut!
